bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE) -- Multi-Channel Operation
Redline
IEEE Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE) -- Multi-Channel Operation - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 1609.4-2016 (Revision of IEEE Std 1609.4-2010) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Multi-channel wireless radio operations, Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE) mode, medium access control (MAC), and physical layers (PHYs), including parameters for priority access, channel switching and routing, management services, and primitives designed for multi-channel operations are described in this standard.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
